sentence: Republicans who are openly critical of Trump, including Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, have been rebuked by their party members.
author: Oma Seddiq
title: Biden blasts the Republican Party after tapes show McCarthy privately criticized Trump over January 6: 'This is a MAGA party now'
